languages.text: {n}Голос Ульфара гулок, как удар палаческого топора по колоде.{/n} "Осмеять, лишить жизни, растоптать личный знак и вычеркнуть из саг. Так мы поступаем на Фенрисе".
{n}Ulfar's voice resounds like a headsman's axe striking the block.{/n} "Mock him, put him to death, trample his personal badge, and expunge him from the sagas. That is the way of Fenris."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Ульфара гулок, как удар палаческого топора по колоде.{/n} "Осмеять, лишить жизни, растоптать личный знак и вычеркнуть из саг. Так мы поступаем на Фенрисе".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar's voice resounds like a headsman's axe striking the block.{/n} "Mock him, put him to death, trample his personal badge, and expunge him from the sagas. That's how we do it on Fenris."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法的声音听起来就像刽子手的斧头砍着垫头的木桩一样。{/n}“我们会嘲笑他，处死他，践踏他的印记，将他从史诗中彻底抹除。这就是我们芬里斯的规矩。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice resounds like a headsman's axe striking the block.{/n} "Mock him, put him to death, trample his personal badge, and expunge him from the sagas. That is the way of Fenris."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法的声音听起来就像刽子手的斧头砍着垫头的木桩一样。{/n}“我们会嘲笑他，处死他，践踏他的印记，将他从史诗中彻底抹除。我们在芬里斯就是这么干的。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfars Stimme hallt wider wie die Axt eines Scharfrichters, die auf den Klotz trifft.{/n} "Verspottet ihn, tötet ihn, trampelt sein persönliches Abzeichen in den Schmutz und tilgt ihn aus den Sagen. So machen wir es auf Fenris."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice resounds like a headsman's axe striking the block.{/n} "Mock him, put him to death, trample his personal badge, and expunge him from the sagas. That is the way of Fenris."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfars Stimme hallt wider wie die Axt eines Scharfrichters, die auf den Klotz trifft.{/n} "Verspottet ihn, tötet ihn, trampelt sein persönliches Abzeichen in den Schmutz getrampelt und tilgt ihn aus den Sagen. So machen wir es auf Fenris."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voz de Ulfar resuena como el hacha de un verdugo al golpear el bloque de madera.{/n} «Burlarse de él, ejecutarlo, pisotear su emblema personal y purgarlo de las sagas. Esa es la costumbre en Fenris».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice resounds like a headsman's axe striking the block.{/n} "Mock him, put him to death, trample his personal badge, and expunge him from the sagas. That is the way of Fenris."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Ulfar resuena como el hacha de un verdugo al golpear el bloque de madera.{/n} «Burlarse de él, ejecutarlo, pisotear su emblema personal y purgarlo de las sagas. Así es como lo hacemos en Fenris».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar vous répond d'une voix si sèche qu'elle vous évoque la hache d'un bourreau s'abattant sur le billot.{/n} « Il faut le railler, l'exécuter, piétiner son insigne et l'effacer des sagas. C'est ainsi que l'on procède, sur Fenris. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice resounds like a headsman's axe striking the block.{/n} "Mock him, put him to death, trample his personal badge, and expunge him from the sagas. That is the way of Fenris."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar vous répond d'une voix si sèche qu'elle vous évoque la hache d'un bourreau s'abattant sur le billot.{/n} « Il faut le railler, l'exécuter, piétiner son insigne et l'effacer des sagas. Voilà comment on procède, sur Fenris. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーの声が、まるで死刑執行人の斧がブロックを打つように響く。{/n}「彼を嘲り、処刑し、個人の階級章を踏みにじり、サーガから抹殺する。それがフェンリス流のやり方だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice resounds like a headsman's axe striking the block.{/n} "Mock him, put him to death, trample his personal badge, and expunge him from the sagas. That is the way of Fenris."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーの声が、まるで死刑執行人の斧がブロックを打つように響く。{/n}「彼を嘲り、処刑し、個人の階級章を踏みにじり、サーガから抹殺する。それがフェンリス流のやり方だ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar'ın sesi, bloka inen cellat baltası misali yankılanıyor.{/n} "Onu alaya al, ölüme mahkûm et, şahsi nişanını çiğneyip geç ve destanlardan adını kazı. Fenris'in yolu budur."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's voice resounds like a headsman's axe striking the block.{/n} "Mock him, put him to death, trample his personal badge, and expunge him from the sagas. That is the way of Fenris."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar'ın sesi, bloka inen cellat baltası misali yankılanıyor.{/n} "Onu alaya al, ölüme mahkûm et, şahsi nişanını çiğneyip geç ve destanlardan adını kazı. Fenris'in yolu budur."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
